text_block_list.name: Spectating Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Wow, it's starting…! What was it, "Shirabyōshi"? Sounds kinda cool～!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: This tale tells of one who lives by the dance. My master stands peerless in our age. Though I, by side, merely crude apprentice, within me dedication yet resides, to that selfsame pinnacle.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My disciple, my cherished disciple. The bell of practice beckons. Come hither.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (As the story begins, the master falls ill. The Shirabyōshi, determined to uphold her master's art, heads to the mountains for training and meets the enigmatic twin butterflies.)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hoo! Ya! Haaa!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Ah, what disappointment, indescribable disappointment. Is this all the worth of the disciple to our age's preeminent dancer?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Timidity abounds in her steps. Behold, even her left hand moves in slovenly manner!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, a disappointment indeed, how pitiful!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Argh! Cease this tumult, cease! …… Nevertheless, my steps… Ugh… I shall attempt once more!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (While teased and advised by the butterflies, the Shirabyōshi devotes herself to training. Then, a peculiar traveling performer arrives…)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (A disciple of a master sword dancer, yet disregarding their footsteps, this performer earns a living with unusual acts using an Ōdachi passed down to them.)

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Now then, a dance I shall present you. Here goes!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wahahaa, such joy, such delight! Dancing is indeed a joyful art!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Though I may not emulate my master's style, to bestow such merriment is a tribute to their grandeur. Ah, such delight～♪

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: (I had to change the script a bit since it was tough, but… my performance was praised for being uniquely me!)

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: (Everyone watching seems to be enjoying it too! It's all smiles, just like a race. Such joy～ Such delight～♪)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (Impressed by the traveling performer's sword dance, the Shirabyōshi deepens her understanding of dance, continuing her training until she masters the most intricate techniques.)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (The twin butterflies, having witnessed her progress, reveal their true identities. They were messengers of the three goddesses ——)

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Through unwavering dedication to the inheritance of your master's skills, our recognition you have swayed. Therefore, we bestow upon you our blessing.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: (That desire to chase, surpass, and carry on the legacy of someone you admire… Surely, that's a feeling everyone holds. To all those emotions, we send our blessings ——)

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: This is the will of the three pillars. Accept this gift.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: (The feelings that Prez put into this offering will be carried on by none other than me. And I will surpass her!)

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: (—— Watch me, "Emperor" Symboli Rudolf! As the "Sovereign", I will create the greatest stage ever!)

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Entrusted to gods supreme, may our ancient path flourish, lasting for ages hereafter ——

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (Thus, the Shirabyōshi, blessed by the butterflies, becomes known as the best dancer of her generation, spreading her arts far and wide ——)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: O mighty and revered three pillars, witness my dance till its end. Draw near, draw near, heed the resolve set in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (—— Madam King, please watch this "first-class" dance, entrusted to me by you…!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: My essence carries my mentor's legacy and the solemnity of the pillars. I am the vessel of ancestral wisdom, pledging to prolong their esteemed heritage.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Proud and noble spirits, swaying gracefully, swayed by flame. Rage throughout heaven and earth, burn bright, lead us to prosperity. I am chronicler of tale, I am successor of legacy.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: —— That "Votive Stage Play" was incredible. It really fired me up… makes me want to see my senior again.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Ah, the senior who inspired you to come to Tracen Academy～? Haha, I can relate to that.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: —— Umm! I'm definitely going to win the next race. The race you won before… so, please come watch.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text: …… Yeah, I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Everyone was so pumped! Definitely the best performance ever♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I agree. It really turned out to be a great show. We couldn't have done it without all of you working hard despite the time constraints.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: More than anything… Ms. Kawakami, you ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: It's all thanks to Madam King that I could pull off the leading role!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— Huh.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I've watched it over and over again! The video of Madam King's Shirabyōshi dance!! It's so graceful, elegant, dignified, yet powerful and beautiful……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: It's the determination I had to follow in Madam King's footsteps, to be someone who carries on her legacy… that drove me to give it my all!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: So it's all thanks to you, Madam King! You truly are my biggest inspiration!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— Ms. Kawakami……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I totally get it!! Watching past performances, like the president's role as butterfly, really fired me up! I set it as my goal to surpass it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's what motivated me to work hard and get this far! Me too… I want to say a big thanks to Prez too.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …… Hehe. Honestly… I'm the one who should be saying thank you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I'm sure Ms. Rudolf feels the same about you two. Taking over from her and creating such an impressive stage.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you think so…? I hope that's the case…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: And… Ms. Kawakami.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Thank you, once again. For accepting the role… and fulfilling my vision.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— ! Uh, ehehehehe… I'm incredibly honored… ehehe…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: —— Ah, look at the fireworks!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (They may rise unsteadily at first, but they bloom magnificently in an instant… For those of us watching, it's nothing but surprises…)
—— A few days after the Festival of Illustrious Equines.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hmhmm～ Hummm～♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— Oh, Ms. Kawakami. …… How long are you planning to keep that on?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Madam King! Ehehe, I absolutely adore this ribbon! It's truly a treasure among treasures!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …… I'm glad you like it, but…… Seeing you so happy with it every day is a bit embarrassing……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Eh?! I-I'm so sorry… um… Should I take it off…?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— Oh, don't make that face!! …… Wear it as much as you like.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… I'll treasure this ribbon filled with Madam King's feelings, forever……!
